abstract.text: A proxy that you use to access the scales and plot area of a chart.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: You get a chart proxy from the
You can use the chart proxy to convert data values to screen coordinates or vice-versa.
Below is an example where we convert the screen coordinates from a drag gesture to

code: // Convert the gesture location to the coordinate space of the plot area.
// Get the x (date) and y (price) value from the location.
let (date, price) = proxy.value(at: location, as: (Date, Double).self)

abstract.text: Construct and customize charts on every Apple platform.
A view that represents a chart’s plot area.
A proxy that you use to access the scales and plot area of a chart.
Returns the angle relative to the plot area center, where the 12 o’clock position is interpreted as zero
degrees, increasing clockwise.
